title: NEA Expansion Bill Passes
flavor: A once-in-a-generation arts funding package hits: workshops, juries, and mentor programs multiply overnight.
special_rule: The first time you take Prof Dev each turn, reduce that Prof Dev card's time cost by 1 (min 1). After resolving Prof Dev, gain +1 craft.

title: ‘No Tax on Tips’ Signed
flavor: A sweeping tax change makes small payments matter again — every little thank-you lands clean.
special_rule: Whenever you complete a Minor Work, gain +1 money.

title: Gig Apps Enter a Price War
flavor: Delivery, rides, errands, ‘creative tasks’ — every app is throwing bonuses around to steal workers.
special_rule: When you Go To Work, refund +1 Time after resolving it (effectively Work costs 1 less time; can reduce to 0).

title: Major Platform Cuts Creator Reach
flavor: The feed changes. Posts flop. Everyone swears it’s ‘temporary,’ but your numbers don’t agree.
special_rule: When resolving a Social card, reduce any inspiration gained by 1 (min 0).

title: Rent Cap Repealed
flavor: The headline is polite. The impact isn’t. Your survival costs jump overnight.
special_rule: At the start of each player's turn, they must either spend 1 money (if able) or lose 1 food.

title: Wellness Trend Goes Mainstream
flavor: Rest becomes aspirational. ‘Recovery routines’ flood the timeline. People finally schedule downtime.
special_rule: Downtime actions cost +1 extra Time (so 2 total), but their benefits double (+2 instead of +1).

title: Open-Source AI Studio Released
flavor: The tools get scary good — clients want speed, audiences want ‘authenticity,’ and everyone argues online.
special_rule: Whenever you complete a Minor Work, choose: gain +1 money OR gain +1 inspiration. However, whenever you would gain craft from Prof Dev, reduce that craft gain by 1 (min 0).

title: Short-Form Video Craze
flavor: Everywhere you look: clips, edits, reels. The culture demands ‘something today.’
special_rule: Whenever you complete a Quick Minor Work, gain +1 inspiration.

title: Convention Season
flavor: Pop-up markets, expos, festivals — crowds are out and they’re ready to spend.
special_rule: When resolving a Social card, gain +1 money, then lose 1 food (min 0).

title: Creator Burnout Discourse
flavor: The whole internet starts talking about rest. People cancel plans, protect their energy, and log off.
special_rule: When resolving a Social card, reduce any inspiration gained by 1 (min 0). Downtime actions cost 1 (normal) but also grant +1 inspiration.

title: Streaming Service Consolidation
flavor: Big mergers. Smaller budgets. Fewer greenlights — but the hits get pushed harder than ever.
special_rule: Whenever you complete a Spotlight Minor Work, gain +2 money. The first time you complete a Quick Minor Work on your turn, gain -1 money from it (min 0).

title: BookTok Craze
flavor: A single recommendation video can change someone’s whole career. Reading is suddenly ‘cool’ again.
special_rule: (Author only) Whenever you complete a Minor Work, gain +1 inspiration. If it was a Career or Spotlight Minor Work, also gain +1 money.

title: Spotify Royalty Model Update
flavor: The payout math changes again. Tiny streams matter less — but loyal listeners matter more.
special_rule: (Musician only) At the start of your turn, if you have a completed Career Minor Work, gain +1 money. Whenever you complete a Quick Minor Work, gain +1 money.

title: Gallery Opening Wave
flavor: A wave of openings hits your city. Everyone wants something on the wall — even if it’s just for the party.
special_rule: (Visual Artist only) When resolving a Social card, gain +1 money. Whenever you complete a Spotlight Minor Work, gain +1 money.

title: Festival Deadline Window
flavor: Submission deadlines stack up. Everyone’s polishing cuts, rewriting loglines, and exporting at 3AM.
special_rule: (Filmmaker only) The first time you take Prof Dev each turn, reduce that Prof Dev card's time cost by 1 (min 1). Whenever you complete a Spotlight Minor Work, gain +1 inspiration.

title: Casting Frenzy
flavor: Casting directors go loud: open calls, mass auditions, and a hundred ‘must-see’ reels.
special_rule: (Actor only) When you Attend a Social event, refund +1 Time after resolving it (event costs 1 less time; can reduce to 0). Whenever you complete a Quick Minor Work, gain +1 inspiration.

title: Dance Challenge Trend
flavor: A new challenge takes over. Everyone’s learning combos, stitching duets, and racing the algorithm.
special_rule: (Dancer only) Whenever you complete a Quick Minor Work, gain +1 inspiration and +1 money.
